item.title: News
item.description: See what I've been up to on Twitter. Please join me at one of these all candidates meetings: Sunday October 7 Host: CIVIC Association of Iranian Time: 1:00 – 3:00pm Location: Coquitlam Library City Centre Branch (Combined Room 136 & 137) Contact: Ali Tootian Phone: 604-809-2294 Email: atootian@yahoo.com Wednesday October 10 Host: Maillardville Residents’ Association Time: 7:00 – 10:00 pm Location: Place Maillardville Community Centre Contact: Al Boire

item.title: Re-Elect Barb Hobson
item.description: Make your plan now... When do polls open? Saturday, October 20, 2018 from 8:00am to 8:00pm. Busy the 20th? There are also advanced voting locations on five days. Where do you vote? You can vote at any of the City of Coquitlam's voting locations (PDF). How will you get there? Plan your route with Google Maps or Translink. Vote! Saturday, October 20, 2018 from 8:00am to 8:00pm. Add to Google calendar   Add to iCal or Outlook Learn when and how to vote from the City of Coquitlam Elections site.

item.title: Successes
item.description: Smiling Creek Elementary opened Sept 4, 2018 bringing 430 new student spaces to Burke Mountain. Since being elected in 2014 our Board has been successful in: Maintaining graduation rates that are #2 province wide, nearly 7% higher than the Provincial average. Repaying $13.4 Million of debt. Building Smiling Creek Elementary, planning an additional elementary and a combined middle/secondary and purchasing land for five schools on Burke Mountain.

item.title: Thanks!
item.description: Thank you for your support!
